description: Try our easy to follow Beef Burger With Caramelised Onion Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,BBQ,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Beef
name: Beef Burger With Caramelised Onion Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Knead the mince in a bowl and season.
Divide mince equally into 4. Wet hands and roll each portion into balls then atten into patties.
Heat BBQ grill or cooking pan to high and cook patties for 3-4 minutes on each side, turning once. Remove patties and top with swiss cheese. Grill bacon rashers and toast buns.
Top each bun base with rocket leaves, cheese topped beef pattie, bacon rasher and a good squeeze of caramelised onion mayonaise. Serve with a side of slaw made with coleslaw dressing.
